entry.tran: (可点燃后拿在手上的)烟花，花炮
entry.def: A sparkler is a small firework that you can hold as it burns. It looks like a piece of thick wire and burns with a lot of small bright sparks.

sentences.sentence: "look at the ice on that dame!"

means.word_mean: 2. a firework that burns slowly and throws out a shower of sparks
